txt.en: The morroval of Dol Guldur possess many idols in the form of bats.

'One of our scouts discovered a strange token on one of the merrevail near Sâd-en-Dagor: a small, carven bat. Whether it is simply an idol of little worth or some bewitchment used upon the bats, we cannot be sure until we have studied more of them.\n\n'Gather a small force and enter Sâd-en-Dagor, north-east of here, you should find more of the wretched merrevail. Search their bodies after you have defeated them for any more of these idols.'
Merrevail can be found at Sâd-en-Dagor in Dol Guldur, north-east of Helethir.\n\nStirnir has asked you to collect bat-idols from the merrevail in Dol Guldur.
'You have returned! I was wondering how long it would take you. Have you brought the idols?\n\n'Good...these will do. Hopefully, one of the lore-masters will be able to make sense of their meaning.'
Stirnir is at Helethir, south-west of Dol Guldur.\n\nYou should return to Stirnir for your reward.
'These idols are strange indeed, you did fine work [placeholder].'
'These idols are strange indeed, you did fine work [placeholder].'
